item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Try resetting your variables again, you can use Lins environmental variable setter.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

If it still doesn’t work then you might as well just use an IDE, it will be far easier to build and run your source from the IDE then it is having to write your batch scripts…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

This is what I set my environmental variables too so hopefully it helps

  1. Go To Computer > Properties > Advanced > Environment Variables

  2. Now Here Make A New PATH at the bottom

Name the path JAVA_JDK

Now Put for the path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(YOUR VERSION OF JDK)\bin

  1. Now make another Path and name it

Now for the path put: C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin

  1. Now Find The Variable Named “Path”

  2. Now inside the variable at the end put this code: ;%JAVA_JDK%;%JAVAHOME%

  3. Now Click Ok and your environment variables are set.

  4. Now Inside of your compiler put this:

@echo off
@title Compiler
javac -cp . *.java
pause
exit

  1. Now It should work

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Frosty26 Frosty26
item.description:
@Frosty26 wrote:

so i’ve set up my enronmental variables as

PATH
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin

CLASSPATH
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_5\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

And now i cant get my compiler to work. my compiler code is

@echo off
title Conception X!
echo Cmon… Compile… Cmon…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_5\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java src/server/gui/*.java
echo YAY!
pause
